default.current_call_style: color: black ; background-color: silver ; border-color: black ; border-radius: 8 ; border: 8px ridge
default.called_number_style: color: black ; background: white ; border: 2px solid

blue.current_call_style: color: blue ; background-color: deepskyblue ; border-color: black ; border-radius: 8 ; border: 8px ridge
blue.called_number_style: color: black ; background: lightblue ; border: 2px solid

red.current_call_style: color: firebrick ; background-color: ghostwhite ; border-color: black ; border-radius: 15 ; border: 8px ridge
red.called_number_style: color: black ; background: hotpink ; border: 2px solid

green.current_call_style: color: lightgreen ; background-color: ghostwhite ; border-color: black ; border-radius: 15 ; border: 8px ridge
green.called_number_style: color: black ; background: green ; border: 2px solid

valentine.current_call_style: color: black ; background-color: ghostwhite ; border-color: black ; border-radius: 15 ; border: 8px ridge
